name: Sylvia C. Boyd
content: Sylvia Boyd Sylvia Boyd Professor Research Interests: · Combinatorial Optimization · Network Design · Integer Programming · Polyhedral Combinatorics Integer Programming, Combinatorial Optimization and Structures Lab · Research · Courses · Graduate Students Sylvia Boyd School of Information Technology and Engineering (SITE), University of Ottawa 800 King Edward Ave. Ottawa, Ontario, Canada, K1N 6N5 Tel: (613) 562-5800 Ext. 6708, Fax: (613) 562-5187 Office: STE 5106 Email: sylvia@site.uottawa.ca Contactez: L'École d'ingénierie et de technologie de l'information / Contact: School of Information Technology and Engineering Copyright © 2000 Université d'Ottawa / University of Ottawa Webmestre / Webmaster
